backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing an art marketplace with artwork CRUD operations, user profiles, ownership transfers, access control via mixins, and blob storage for images.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a request to increase artwork card image dimensions in the Gallery page while maintaining list layout.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, hooks, views, and utilities for the art gallery application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes using warm, gallery-appropriate tones.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Z'art application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication, routing between gallery and upload views, artwork detail dialog, profile setup flow, and sold display preferences with background texture.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: Component displaying a login-required message with shield icon and button to return to gallery when unauthenticated users try to access restricted pages.
Form component supporting create and edit modes for artworks with image upload/replacement, client-side optimization, progress tracking, prefilled fields in edit mode, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/components/AppHeaderNav.tsx: Navigation component with a Gallery button that highlights the active route.
frontend/src/components/ArtworkCard.tsx: Card component displaying artwork with enlarged image (h-80), title below, and sold status shown as either badge or diagonal watermark based on display mode preference.
frontend/src/components/ArtworkDetailDia: Dialog component displaying full artwork details with image, metadata, and optional sold status toggle. Implements optimistic UI updates for sold status changes with error handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component for Internet Identity authentication that handles login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog for initial user profile setup that prompts for and validates a user's name before allowing app access.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and auth client lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Hook that queries the backend to determine if the current authenticated user has admin privileges.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for CRUD operations on artworks and user profiles, including listing, creating, updating, deleting artworks and managing sold status.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoute.ts: Custom routing hook using URL hash to manage navigation between gallery and upload routes with support for edit mode parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useSoldDisplayPrefere: Hook managing user preference for sold artwork display mode (badge or watermark) with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color palette for light and dark themes using warm gallery-inspired colors and CSS custom properties.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider context before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/utils/formatGBP.ts: Utility function that converts pence (bigint) to formatted GBP currency string using Intl.NumberFormat.
frontend/src/utils/imageOptimize.ts: Provides image optimization functionality that resizes images to max 2048px dimension and compresses to JPEG at 85% quality if they exceed 2MB file size, using canvas-based resizing with high-quality smoothing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and persisting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/src/views/GalleryView.tsx: Gallery view component that displays a filterable grid of artwork cards with controls for showing/hiding sold items and selecting sold display mode (badge or watermark), plus an optional upload shortcut button for authenticated users.
frontend/src/views/UploadView.tsx: Upload/edit view component that renders an AdminUploadForm, supporting both new artwork creation and editing existing artworks by ID with loading and error states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, custom fonts (Inter and Playfair Display), container queries, typography plugin, and custom animations for accordions.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking an art gallery application with a recent feature to enlarge gallery images while maintaining list layout with titles below images within cards.
